html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08032024-06-21ECCC
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal and Diamond Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to authorize the deposit of mine waste generated by the Dome Mine Project to certain fish-frequented water bodies. A requirement to this authorization is for the Proponent to offset the loss of fish habitat resulting from the disposal of mine waste by developing and implementing a Fish Habitat Compensation Plan.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0149 Publication Date: 2024-07-03
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to authorize the deposit of mine waste generated by the Dome Mine Project to certain fish-frequented water bodies. A requirement to this authorization is for the Proponent to offset the loss of fish habitat resulting from the disposal of mine waste by developing and implementing a Fish Habitat Compensation Plan.
